website_summaries.verdict: Everything you need for a beautiful shower in one convenient package.
pros: 76 piece set includes banners, balloons, tassels, bingo cards, a balloon pump, paper lanterns, drinking straws, mommy to be sash, and more
Plenty of value at a low price point
Pink and gold color scheme includes multiple shades of pink
cons: It takes quite a bit of time to set everything up

customer_reviews.title: A++ Seller and Baby Shower Kit
customer_reviews.text: I love the balloons and all the inclusive decorations that came in this baby shower kit. I accidentally popped one of the letters of my ballons. The seller went above and beyond to get me another set of balloons so it could come on time for my sister baby shower. I have nothing but amazing things to express about this seller. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: So cute! Had everything I needed!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! And it had everything I needed for the baby shower. I saved a lot of time and money by purchasing this item. I feel like it's the only way to go for any other event I host from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly McNabb

customer_reviews.title: I Loved It!!
customer_reviews.text: Everybody loved the decorations for my daughter's baby shower. We had no trouble assembling the pompoms, lanterns (can rip at top if not careful with metal part but not noticeable when up), tassels. We used EVERYTHING which is A LOT! GREAT BUY! I used the "Baby Shower" letters on the gift bags for a game/decoration. We used the pompoms over the windows, the "It's a Girl" on desert table, and the OH BABY above the gift table (fringe curtain not included in package).
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: Loved it all
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything that came in the package. I will definitely be ordering from them for any parties I host for friends. I love throwing parties. Anything to have an excuse to have fun. The decorations definitely met all my expectations. Great value for the whole package. I would love to host more parties from decorations just from them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was lovely stuff, but
customer_reviews.text: We had a hard time with understanding some of the directions. I'm not a craftsy person, but there were a bunch of us, and the poms poms were not easy to understand and the stringey things were not so great either. I did love the sign, the balloons, so overall it was a great value, but some of the decorations I could have passed on.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Keating

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to the tea part baby shower I put together. Was a big hit. Be careful not to over fill 'OH BABY' balloon. Ours started randomly exploding within minutes of filling.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Painter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kit for your babyshower.
customer_reviews.text: Cutest baby shower decorations. The color is perfect and it came with a ton of stuff. Good kit for someone who doesnt want to sit and find everything and match it all to a certain color scheme. We just went and bought a few more streamers and ballons but over all this was the majority of our buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shyane Hlatko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value and SUPER cute decor!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for a baby shower I’m hosting in a few weeks. Still in the process of assembling everything but these are a few pictures of what I’m working with so far! For the price I paid I’m very pleased!!! I’ll be using this even after the baby shower to either decorate my daughters room with or my craft room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The decorations were beautiful and the guest of honor loved how it all ...
customer_reviews.text: The pink “it’s a girl” balloons we’re not included in this package, but I did receive everything else. The decorations were beautiful and the guest of honor loved how it all turned out! Just make sure to give yourself time to put them together (before the day of the party). It took me a good 45 minutes to prep it all as you have to put each piece together, even the pompoms. Overall, great deal for the amount of decorations for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described but time consuming & without all needed items to assemble properly
customer_reviews.text: If you want to save money, this is a great option. You will need to order a few days to a week in advance so you can ASSEMBLE the decorations yourself. You will need to assemble each pendent banner. Be cautious as any quick movements will result in tearing the entire pendant. You will want to order extra curling ribbon, air pump, a helium tank, tape, another large sewing needle, and scissors. We received a lot of feedback on the product ranging from just ok to good.
customer_reviews.author: GroZen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect time saver package
customer_reviews.text: This package was a hit! Easy to assemble and there was enough to decorate a large living room, dining room and entry way. I recommend this product to anyone who needs a all in one kit verses someone who like to shop around. I will definitely reorder this product if I ever have a need. The items do not feel cheap and looked amazing. Comes with a easy to install balloon ribbon.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fantastic set and packaged so cute! The balloon arch gave me and my husband a run for our money but it came out very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This turned out perfectly. They forgot to ship the balloons and when we contacted them they sent us the entire order again. I figured they’d just send the balloons that they missed, but no! They even added in extra balloons. The whole set is super cute, really pretty and looks exactly how the photos show.
customer_reviews.author: n.marston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby shower
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price for everything that is included. Didn’t need to buy any other decorations, and didn’t even use everything that came in this kit. I was able to find a pink, white & gold balloon garland that matched this set exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that was annoying was that the air pump didn’t work. I recommend putting some of the things together the night before because it is timely!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved it !!
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute ! And are very good quality I highly recommend it especially because baby showers can be expensive and this made it very easy and less stressful!
customer_reviews.author: krista

customer_reviews.title: DIY Decorations
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this is a 'you get what you pay for' situation. Great price for everything this includes, but it is truly a DIY set. You have to string the individual tassels, create the poms by pulling apart individual pieces of tissue paper (which I couldn't get the hang of and looked awful), etc etc. Next time I would splurge for something a bit more expensive to save myself the time and headache.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... baby shower decorations and the amount of decoration was perfect. The tassels took sometime to assemble them but ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an outdoor baby shower decorations and the amount of decoration was perfect. The tassels took sometime to assemble them but other than that., everything was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Blexys

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Costumer
customer_reviews.text: I got this baby shower package and went to get the gold balloons filled for the baby shower and there where 6 balloons but it did not spell "oh baby" it did not spell anything at all. G G A C Y H are the letters from this package. Very disappointed by this. Had to go out and find more gold balloons the day of the baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Pineau

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service, outstanding item!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing customer service, outstanding item. Everyone loved my decorations and asked where I got it from!!!!
customer_reviews.author: temple

customer_reviews.title: Completely amazed with the value this set offers
customer_reviews.text: Completely amazed with the value this set offers. We had been planning yesterday's baby shower for a while. Like everyone we wanted to stay on a budget while making the party look great and this set did just that! It also got here right on time as expected. I ordered a few days before the party after looking in several stores, so I was really hoping it did. Happy with everything over all, definitely 5 stars and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, money saving
customer_reviews.text: If you have the time to assemble, would recommend this was plenty of decorations to decorate up and downstairs of my friends baby shower, you definitely get a bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny fortune

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely worth that money. I spent a lot of time to setup everything but it looks great!! I’m happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Leo Burkatov

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t yet used the decoration but just by opening the items i loved them already. At first i was upset that the balloons were missing, I quickly emailed the seller and to my surprise they resolved my problem asap. So im very happy with their products and will definitely purchase more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great baby shower decor
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for baby shower 💖 lots of items all good quality
customer_reviews.author: Long & Luscious

customer_reviews.title: Wide variety of decorations! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely has a wide variety of decorations. Everything came as pictured. Not all the pinks match but when used with other items..it all blends. Plan ahead..there is DYI involved. It took a couple hours to make the tassles and tissue paper Pom Poms. I thought the bright gold didn’t quite tie in with the other colors so we used it by itself else where. Instructions are easy to follow and simple to do. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Cute but time consuming
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute! Perfect for my sisters baby shower. We didn’t use everything that came but people loved them and the bingo. It does take some time to put everything together since you have to assemble a lot of it but everything was nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Baby shower
customer_reviews.text: They were easy to use. I used them for my stepdaughter’s baby shower .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Most items from amazon come in very cheap, little to no packaging. This came in a cute box and is all actually pretty good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lace

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Decorations were beautiful and we got a lot of compliments on them, beware of how time consuming putting each piece together may be.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Loved them! The quality is amazing and they look super elegant!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Great to order from
customer_reviews.text: Decorations were nice and very pretty, Looked great with the cake and cupcakes. The seller is super nice and makes sure your order is taken care of. I would order from them again
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Cook

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal! Comes with so much stuff and perfect for decorating for a baby shower!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Huddleston

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: i looked hard to find a good set for a baby shower and bought this one. It came in just a few days and it was very easy to put together! everything was nice looking and there were helpful tips and instructions inside.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It did it’s job for my sister baby shower. However you literally have to put it all together. Which is time consuming so prep before.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this kit, it is a great deal for your money. My only negative would be that the oh baby balloons didn’t float even with helium because they were too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: Loved it bit tassels didn't make a long enough strand only about 2 1/2 foot. And my package did not contain the it's a girl balloons which was disappointing. I wish I checked it before the day of the baby shower.

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this product
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this product. This product was very durable and it was better quality than I was expecting when I purchased it. Perfect decor for a party.
customer_reviews.author: Amy N May

customer_reviews.title: Loved how organized and boxed
customer_reviews.text: The moment I opened the box it brought joy and Happiness to my heart. Great quality so much products for the price, very organized and very elegant. Lots of products in this box and colors are amazing I ended up with so much more to use for another party. I really enjoyed this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Price and amount of decorations
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this the amount and price!! The decorations were amazing u didnt have to break your head they were all there which made life easier! Price is great for wat you get😄

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Loved this very easy to set up and it had,everything you need to for a baby shower for a girl

customer_reviews.title: Great value !

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful😍
customer_reviews.text: Ok i had to write a review about these items let me tell you from the packaging to the price it's amazing and a steal!! It's so pretty ! I do recommend to anyone that's having a baby shower !!!

customer_reviews.title: Time consuming
customer_reviews.text: Came out beautiful but it was alot of work to put together and takes quite a long time to assemble everything . But Great product . Loved it in the end

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! All in one!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Had a great baby shower party at home! Decoration kit is exact same as described.

customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. The packaging was phenomenal. I received so many compliments at my sister baby shower. Will definitely repurchase when another baby shower comes up.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!!, Read packaging!!

customer_reviews.title: My WIFE loved the colors!
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition and well packaged. Great product by the way, I cant wait until they offer more color's. The OH BABY balloons is my favorite part. Thanks again EGLAF for this Bundle!

customer_reviews.text: Great quality decorations! Easy to put together. My wife loved it and so did all of our friends and family!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!

customer_reviews.text: Everything as pictured! So many beautiful vibrant colors! Definitely made my little girls baby shower scandalous ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value. Couldn't believe I ordered so much for ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Couldn't believe I ordered so much for so little. I will be recommending this to other people now.

customer_reviews.title: C balloons are Really B when aired up.

product_meta.title: Premium Baby Shower Decorations Pink and Gold | Full Set Including 120 Balloons| It's A Girl-Banner, Pom Poms, Lanterns, Etc. For Birthday Parties,Newborns|0-18 Months| Gift Wrapping Available
product_meta.description:
Perfect for: BabyShower, Pregnancy Announcement, Gender Reveal, First Birthday Party, Nursery Decorations, Little Princess or Baby Showers


Emacity’s Baby Shower Decorations - Pink And Gold Decor Package include:

BANNER
1 x 10-piece IT'S A GIRL pink card stock with gold lettering
1 x 11-piece BABY SHOWER pink card stock with gold lettering

BALLOONS
1 x 10-piece Baby Shower 16" Gold foil letters balloons
1 x 6-piece OH BABY 16" Gold foil letters balloons
23 x pink, white and confetti balloons
10 x pink "It's A Girl” Balloons
92 x premium pink, white and gold Balloons for balloon arch
**Comes with an Air Pump for inflating Balloons with air only.

POM POMS
1 x 8" pink pom poms
1 x 8" gold pom poms
1 x 8" white pom poms


PAPER LANTERNS & HONEYCOMBS
2 x 6” pink, white and gold lanterns
2 x 8” pink, white and gold lanterns
2 x 10” pink, white and gold lanterns
2 x 6” pink & white paper honeycombs
2 x 8” pink & white paper honeycombs

EXTRAS
100 x pink and gold straws
20 x baby bingo card and bingo chips
1 x balloon arch(balloons included as shown in image above)
1 x mommy to be sash
1 x set of gold string for balloons

EASY ASSEMBLING
Picture Instructions included for quick assembling
feature_bullets: A great joy is coming all wrapped in pink! Excited to meet the new little lady soon? We've teamed up this adorable set with some of the most popular matching pink, gold and white decorations to help you create a complete & stylish look of your Baby Shower!

"ITS A GIRL" SET INCLUDES: (2)pink "it's a girl & baby shower banners”, (3)tissue pom poms pink, gold and white, (6)lanterns pink & gold, (4)honeycomb balls pink and white,1 BIG "oh baby" balloons set, 1 BIG “baby shower” balloons set, (23)party balloons pink, white and confetti, (12)it's a girl balloons pink, (93)premium pink, white and gold balloons for the balloon arch, (100)baby shower straws, (20)baby bingo cards, (1)mother sash, (1)air pump, (1)balloon arch, (3) printable baby shower games

STRESS-FREE & TIME-SAVING: you don’t have to be a DIY expert to use these decorations and to spend hours assembling everything. We have selected the most beautiful and easy to assemble baby shower decorations for you (No Tassels! No torn tissue! No Hassle! Hurraayy!). Each item needs seconds to be ready for hanging! You will really enjoy this easy, quick and fun activity! And you will be pleasantly surprised by the final result!

IDEAS FOR USE – Hang the decorations at the entry to let everyone know where the party is; Display them at the front of the gift table; Hang them over the head table for great photo ops; Style a fun photo booth for great party pics with a banner and decorations in the background; Create a magical atmosphere hanging them between the trees or across aisles!
100% GUARANTEE SATISFACTION: – Love it or your money back, no questions asked

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars177 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
